# Config Passphrase

Location in GUI:
`System` » `System Settings` » `Global AES Passphrase Encryption Settings`

### Terraform modules

* [Config Passphrase](https://registry.terraform.io/modules/netascode/config-passphrase/aci/latest)

{{ doc_gen }}

### Examples

```yaml
apic:
  fabric_policies:
    config_passphrase: Cisco123!Cisco123!
```
